com.topjohnwu.superuser

Interface Shell.Async.Callback

  • Enclosing class:
    Shell.Async

    public static interface Shell.Async.Callback
    The callback when an asynchronous shell operation is done.

    When an asynchronous shell operation is done, it will pass over the result of the output to onTaskResult(List, List). If both outputs are null, then the callback will not be called. When an error occurs, onTaskError(Throwable) will be invoked. All callbacks will always run on the main thread.

    The two lists passed to the callback are wrapped with Collections.synchronizedList(List).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onTaskError(Throwable err)
      The callback when asynchronous shell operation throws an error.
      void onTaskResult(List<String> out, List<String> err)
      The callback that will be invoked when asynchronous shell operation is done.

    • Method Detail

      • onTaskError

        void onTaskError(Throwable err)
        The callback when asynchronous shell operation throws an error.
        Parameters:
        err - the Throwable thrown in the task.

      • onTaskResult

        void onTaskResult(List<String> out,
                  List<String> err)
        The callback that will be invoked when asynchronous shell operation is done. If out == err, then err will be null. This means if Shell.FLAG_REDIRECT_STDERR is set, the output of STDERR would be stored in out, err will be null, unless explicitly passed a different list to store STDERR while request.
        Parameters:
        out - the list that stores the output of STDOUT.
        err - the list that stores the output of STDERR.
